sentences.en: You, or your spouse, must be at least 60 to participate.
sentences.cn: 你或你的配偶至少要有60岁才能加入。

sentences.en: It is often helpful to have your spouse in the room when major news is expected.
sentences.cn: 在等待重大消息时，让你的配偶在场往往是很有好处的。

sentences.en: In theory, a girl may veto the spouse her parents have chosen.
sentences.cn: 理论上，女孩可以否决她父母已为之选择的配偶。
